hymn.title: Lord, I give myself to You again today

layout.singingstanza: Lord, I give my -- self to You a -- gain to -- day Lord, on this con -- se -- cra -- tion path I choose to stay You bought me with a price My life I sa -- cri -- fice Lord, I am not my own.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, I give myself to You again today Lord, on this consecration path I choose to stay You bought me with a price My life I sacrifice Lord, I am not my own.
Lord, I give myself to You again today Your mercy reached me though I was so far away You gave Yourself for me From whose earthly dreams You freed Lord, I am Yours alone.
Lord, I give myself to You again today I open to You so that You may have a way To work in me that I Might serve You my whole life Lord, I love You alone.
